    single cell GEO records

    Rui Fu

    RNA Bioscience Initative, University of Colorado School of Medicine

    2020-11-16

    get_geo.Rmd

    Current GEO query used:

    "expression profiling by high throughput sequencing" AND
("single nuclei" OR "single cell" OR "scRNAseq" OR "scRNA-seq" OR "snRNAseq" OR "snRNA-seq")

    The fraction of GEO entries with potential metadata (file with “meta”, “annot”, or “type” in filename or rda/rds/rdata files) is 0.1326206. Note however that these terms include some false positives (such as gene annotation file, patient metadata, and phenotype table), which we manually inspected and corrected (false positive fraction at 0.1115242). Final fraction: 0.126553

    Parse database from Svensson et al.
